title: (x) Oprah magazine serif font - Hoefler Titling {Stephen}
content:
I know everyone here reads O magazine. Why, O and Typophile practically go hand in hand. So you should have no trouble with this one, but it's been bugging me for months.   
   
Alan   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424142824im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/11512.jpg)
author: alan

comments.content:
Wow, thanks! I love this typeface, it just sings. I wish I had a mantra ... I'm just stuck with all these haikus.   
   
Alan

Hello Alan. Could it be [Hoefler Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424142824/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/hoeflertitling/index.html)?   
Would help to see some italics.

Yeah, I'm betting on [Semibold Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424142824/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/hoeflertitling/more2.html).   
   
Remember my mantra:   
_When it's a glossy mag font you seek to ID   
Check first the work of Hoefler, Johnny._
